metadata.description:
Title: Unlockable Content AZ1441, AZ1476, AZ1485



Narrative:

It is truly remarkable how the “open sea” just outside this fortified walls has also played a key role in making the inmates AZ1441, AZ1476 and AZ1485 the quintessential ultimate “unlockable content” they were – pardon the pun. I can only imagine the number of times that Frank Morris, Clarence and brother John Anglin rehearsed in their minds sizing out and taking on the elements of the vast open sea every time they stepped out onto this courtyard right under the constant, hawkish gaze from the prison tower. Even if they make it past the wall, they still have the vast open sea to deal with. But their dreams were too strong, their hopes high, their triumph real. And so on June 11, 1962, they did the rarest thing. That is pretty much the reason to call this NFT Unlockable Content AZ1441, AZ1476, AZ1485.  



Collection:     Unlockable Content

Owner:             MSA

Date Taken:     Fall, 1984

Dimension:         2435 x 1722, 13cm x 9cm (Original)

Size:            288 KB

Paper:             Kodak 

Time of Day:     Afternoon

Medium:         Analog

Location:         Recreation Yard, Alcatraz Prison, San Francisco, USA
